title: pixel 2 xl only charges
content:
hi guys my pixel 2xl only charges I cant transfer files from phone to usb anymore
I used to download music and put the songs on a usb file and then usb in car head unit and listen to my music while driving ..,.
one day I was transferring a lot of music and the phone shut down was not over heating and it was not low battery ...
when I turned it back on it couldn't see the usb anymore and now the usb type c to aux adapter is not working my laptop cant read It anymore and fast boot and adb wont work so I cant flash stock ota and image
please help this is really bothering me
